description: The woman with long black hair and glasses, and the man with blond hair and blue eyes, painting the walls of the old library.
text:
Elena: I can't believe we're actually doing this.
Tom: Me neither, but it's going to be great.

description: The woman with long black hair and glasses, and the man with blond hair and blue eyes, putting up shelves in the old library.
text:
Elena: This is hard work, but it's worth it.
Tom: I know, it's going to be such a great space for the community.

description: The woman with long black hair and glasses, and the man with blond hair and blue eyes, working on the computers in the old library.
text:
Elena: We're almost finished.
Tom: Just a few more hours and we'll be ready for the community meeting.

description: The woman with long black hair and glasses, and the man with blond hair and blue eyes, standing in the finished community center.
text:
Elena: It's beautiful.
Tom: I can't wait to see the community's reaction.

description: The woman with long black hair and glasses, and the man with blond hair and blue eyes, giving a speech at the community meeting in the newly renovated community center.
text:
Elena: Welcome to our new community center.
Tom: We hope you enjoy this space as much as we do.
